h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Many times, defeating a certain boss and obtaining a unique Crafting Material will unlock a new recipe, but you won't see it until you return to the Shrine to rest. This can apply to both Gear and Weapons. Later on, you'll even be able to craft Medicines once someone teaches you in Chapter 2.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '1\. Keepers Shrines Will Keep Expanding'.
The content is as follows:
Many times, defeating a certain boss and obtaining a unique Crafting Material will unlock a new recipe, but you won't see it until you return to the Shrine to rest. This can apply to both Gear and Weapons. Later on, you'll even be able to craft Medicines once someone teaches you in Chapter 2.
